column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Tram - Thanks for your review. And thank you for the kind words. Unfortunately
column2: parking is an issue pretty much wherever you go in Midtown -- not to make excuses -- but our building does offer free valet service on the first floor of the parking garage (tipping is recommended). For future visits
column3: please ask your server to cut your seasoned egg in half. It's a fairly common request
column4: and we would be happy to accommodate. Thank you again for your patronage and we look forward to serving you again soon!
